sentences.en: But compared to debating the legalisation of drugs, that was a doddle.
sentences.cn: 但是与毒品合法化辩论相比, 那只是小菜一碟.

sentences.en: It's no doddle being a teacher, you know.
sentences.cn: 你知道,当老师决非易事.

sentences.en: That hill's an absolute doddle ( to climb ).
sentences.cn: ( 爬 ) 上那座山岗毫不费力.

sentences.en: This is a doddle to control with its well - designed on - screen menu.
sentences.cn: 这款相机具备显示屏菜单,其设计使操作变得相当简单.

sentences.en: Transferring cine film or slides to video should be a doddle.
sentences.cn: 把电影胶片或幻灯片转换成视频应该不费吹灰之力。

words.tran_cn: 轻而易举的事，不费吹灰之力的事

trans.tran_cn: <英，非正>是件容易做的事，是件轻而易举的事，简单之极的任务（或活动）
